command_list.command: item replace entity @s weapon.mainhand with stellarisdlc:symmetryspear
execute at @s run playsound star:foresight block @p ~ ~ ~ 1.5 1
execute at @s run playsound star:foresight block @p ~ ~ ~ 1.5 1

hit_command_list.command: execute at @s run playsound minecraft:block.anvil.land block @p[distance=..16] ~ ~ ~ 1

command_list.command: execute at @s run playsound star:foresight block @p ~ ~ ~ 1.5 1

hit_command_list.command: execute at @s run playsound minecraft:block.anvil.land block @p[distance=..16] ~ ~ ~ 1
execute as @p at @p run playsound epicfight:entity.hit.blade_rush_last master @s ~ ~ ~ 0.8
execute as @p at @p run particle epicfight:blade_rush ~ ~1 ~ 0 0 0 1 1
execute as @p at @s run execute at @s run playsound epicfight:sfx.neutralize_bosses block @p[distance=..32] ~ ~ ~ 1.2

command_list.command: execute at @s run playsound star:sekiro block @a[distance=..20] ~ ~ ~ 1.3
execute at @s run playsound minecraft:entity.generic.explode block @p[distance=..32] ~ ~ ~ 1
execute at @s run playsound minecraft:entity.generic.explode block @p[distance=..32] ~ ~ ~ 1
execute at @s run playsound minecraft:entity.generic.explode block @p[distance=..32] ~ ~ ~ 1
execute at @s run playsound minecraft:entity.generic.explode block @p[distance=..32] ~ ~ ~ 1
